dt: {bc}a metrical foot of four syllables with one long and three short syllables (as in classical prosody) or with one stressed and three unstressed syllables (as in English prosody)

et: Latin, from Greek {it}paiōn{/it}, from {it}paian, paiōn{/it} paean
shortdef: a metrical foot of four syllables with one long and three short syllables (as in classical prosody) or with one stressed and three unstressed syllables (as in English prosody)
